mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_music WHERE artist LIKE CONCAT('%', #{artist}, '%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') LIMIT 1
SELECT albumCov FROM tb_music WHERE musicIdx = #{musicIdx}

SELECT m.* FROM ( SELECT t2.musicIdx FROM ( SELECT tb_aiplaylist.musicIdx, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY tb_myplaylist.myplIdx ORDER BY RAND()) AS rn FROM tb_myplaylist INNER JOIN tb_aiplaylist ON tb_myplaylist.myplIdx = tb_aiplaylist.myplIdx WHERE tb_myplaylist.memId = #{memId} GROUP BY tb_aiplaylist.musicIdx, tb_myplaylist.myplIdx ) t2 WHERE t2.rn <= 4 ) t1 INNER JOIN tb_music m ON t1.musicIdx = m.musicIdx
